name: Root Picker
description:
Welcome to my first game!

This is just a small prototype for a game I have been making in my freetime. Its a simple game where you just collect roots to put in a basket so you can earn money and spend it on upgrades! 

Currently the game is in its infance stages, so there is not much to it. But I plan on adding newer features in the near future to hopefully make this experience enjoyable for you!

If you have any feedback on the game, be it positive or negative, I would be more than happy to hear your input so I can make improvents.

Thank you for taking the time to play and enjoy your day!
